ij.plugin

Class FolderOpener

  • java.lang.Object
    • ij.plugin.FolderOpener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlugIn

    public class FolderOpener
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlugIn
    Implements the File/Import/Image Sequence command, which opens a folder of images as a stack.
